release.action: New interface ContentManagerUI: This is a markup interface for all ContentManagerUI. A ContentManagerUI is an interface to modify the ui behaviours of content manager.
New interface TabbedContentManagerUI: is used to modify the ui behaviours of a JTabbedPane that shows registered contents.
New interface DesktopContentManagerUI: is used to modify the ui behaviours of a JDesktopPane that shows registered contents.
